title: Issue prioritization v2: Add scoring dimensions + base schema for multi-view scoring

sections.text: Introduce a normalized data model for issue_priotization v2 to support multi-view scoring across Support SLA risk, Product impact, and Sales deal blockers. Add backend fields/structures to store per-dimension scores, weights, and an aggregated score, while maintaining backward compatibility with the current single-score setup. This ticket focuses on schema + API contract changes only; UI, saved profiles, and tuning controls will be handled in subsequent tickets.
